item.title: [PI] Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Not sure which way you’re loading the clicking case for the Fairy…

But, if you’re using Scripts, check npc1.py for the Fairy’s ID, and make sure it’s opening shop 19.
If you use ActionHandler, check the method ‘firstClickNPC’ for the Fairy’s case.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

shop        = 19        Armour_Shop_2        2        2        1153        100        1115        100        1067        100        1191        100        1157        100        1119        100        1069        100        1193        100        1165        100        1125        100        1077        100        1195        100        1159        100        1121        100        1071        100        1197        100        1161        100        1123        100        1073        100        1199        100        1163        100        1127        100        1079        100        1201        100        3749        100        3751        100        3753        100        3755        100        10828        100        5574        100        5575        100        5576        100

the code you added, look at it start. Maybe it wud work if you change it to the following:

shop = 19        Armour_Shop_2        2        2        1153        100        1115        100        1067        100        1191        100        1157        100        1119        100        1069        100        1193        100        1165        100        1125        100        1077        100        1195        100        1159        100        1121        100        1071        100        1197        100        1161        100        1123        100        1073        100        1199        100        1163        100        1127        100        1079        100        1201        100        3749        100        3751        100        3753        100        3755        100        10828        100        5574        100        5575        100        5576        100

I think there shouldn’t be any tab between ‘shop’ and ‘=’. You added a tab there and your shop wasnt recogonized.

Hope I help.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @G0ds_Arr0w0s G0ds Arr0w0s
item.description:
@G0ds_Arr0w0s wrote:

[quote=“b15, post:3, topic:365025”]ok this is an easy fix. you must add the shop in client.java and shops.cfg.

search for:

WanneShop = 1

you will see something like } else if (NPCID == 461) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1;
now just copy that and change the 1 " WanneShop = 1" to what ever # u made the shop to in shops.cfg

also put // before fairy like this “//fairy” when u put the // your compiler will not compile the text after the // so you wont get errors and you can put notes beside your codes.[/quote]

This should work, but if not make sure your spacing is correct

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok this is an easy fix. you must add the shop in client.java and shops.cfg.

search for:

WanneShop = 1

you will see something like } else if (NPCID == 461) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1;
now just copy that and change the 1 " WanneShop = 1" to what ever # u made the shop to in shops.cfg

also put // before fairy like this “//fairy” when u put the // your compiler will not compile the text after the // so you wont get errors and you can put notes beside your codes.

Read full topic
